mapper.insert: insert into course(co_num,co_me_id,co_title,co_content,co_cc_category_num,co_cs_schedule_num,co_total_distance) select ifnull(max(co_num), 0)+1, #{id},#{cos.co_title},#{cos.co_content}, #{cos.co_cc_category_num},#{cos.co_cs_schedule_num},#{cos.co_total_distance} from course
mapper.select: select * from product where pd_title like concat('%',#{pr.pd_title},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into course_item(ci_index, ci_co_num, ci_pd_num) value(#{index},#{co_num},#{pd_num})
mapper.select: select * from file where fi_table_key = #{pd_num} and fi_category like concat('%',#{fi_category},'%') and fi_table = #{fi_table}
select * from course_item join product on pd_num = ci_pd_num where ci_co_num = #{co_num} order by ci_num asc
select * from file where fi_category like concat('%',#{fi_category},'%') and fi_table = #{fi_table}
select * from course join course_schedule on cs_schedule_num = co_cs_schedule_num join course_category on cc_category_num = co_cc_category_num where co_num = #{co_num}
mapper.update: update course set co_title = #{cos.co_title}, co_content = #{cos.co_content}, co_cc_category_num = #{cos.co_cc_category_num}, co_cs_schedule_num = #{cos.co_cs_schedule_num}, co_total_distance = #{cos.co_total_distance}, co_update_date = now() where co_me_id = #{id} and co_num = #{co_num}
mapper.select: select * from `like` where li_me_id = #{me_id} and li_table_key = #{li_co_num} and li_table = #{table}
mapper.insert: insert into `like`(li_me_id, li_table_key, li_updown, li_table) values(#{li.li_me_id}, #{li.li_table_key}, #{li.li_updown}, #{li.li_table})
mapper.update: update course set co_up = ( select count(*) from `like` where li_table_key = #{li_co_num} and li_updown = 1 and li_table = 'course'), co_down = ( select count(*) from `like` where li_table_key = #{li_co_num} and li_updown = -1 and li_table = 'course') where co_num = #{li_co_num}
mapper.insert: insert into report(rep_table_key, rep_content, rep_category, rep_table, rep_me_id) values(#{rep.rep_table_key},#{rep.rep_content},#{rep.rep_category},#{rep.rep_table},#{rep.rep_me_id})
mapper.update: update course set co_report = co_report+1 where co_num = #{co_num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from report where rep_me_id = #{rep.rep_me_id} and rep_table = #{rep.rep_table} and rep_table_key = #{rep.rep_table_key}
mapper.update: update course set co_views = co_views + 1 where co_num = #{co_num}
